author: Staff Reporter
text:
A godown at ACTS colony storing plastic materials were destroyed in a fire here on Sunday.

According to police, the incident occurred when the owner Kaliappan had closed the godown after loading used plastic to Chennai and Bengaluru. According to sources, the fire spread farther after the water pumping motor of the fire service vehicle faced a glitch. The delay had caused the fire to rage causing extensive damage. After a three –hour long battle, the fire was extinguished. The loss of the damaged plastic was estimated around Rs. 50 lakh and cause of the fire was yet to be ascertained.
title: Fire at plastic godown
